body.name: Tilhumt 2 in 1 Montessori Weaning Table and Chair Set with Built-in Chalkboard, Height Adjustable Chair for Toddlers, Kids Activity Table for Drawing, Dining, Reading, and Playing
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 9 hrs 16 mins
features: 【Nurture Your Toddler's Creativity】 Our weaning table is designed to grow with your child, making it an ideal choice for meals, reading, drawing, crafting, and more. The unique feature of a chalkboard on the back of the table encourages your little one's artistic side, providing a space for them to freely express their creativity. 3 chalks and 1 eraser are included

【Safety and Fun Combined】 The Montessori table features rounded corners and non-slip pads, protecting young children from potential harm. The anti-drop fence prevents toys and utensils from falling off the table, providing parents with extra peace of mind

【Height-Adjustable Chair】 With 3 height options - 5.5", 6.9" and 8.3" - our toddler chair is an economical solution to your baby's needs at different ages, ensuring they always have a comfortable and safe place to sit, while also helping them develop good sitting posture

【Effortless Prefabricated Assembly】Come with a set of screws and detailed instructions, easy to finish assembly in 10 minutes. All the assembly screws are counter-sunk and safe from scrapes or bumps. The smooth and waterproof surface makes it easy to wipe down. The chair can be put under the table, no need to worry about taking up a lot of space

【CPC Certificated】 Expertly crafted from premium, odorless birchwood plywood, this robust Montessori table set is not only designed to withstand the test of time but also promotes environmental sustainability. The eco-friendly material used is free from harmful chemicals, ensuring it's safe for your child and the environment. Its sturdy construction guarantees resistance against deformation or breakage, promising years of dependable use
WARNING: To be used under the direct supervision of an adult.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My grandchild loves this table and chair set so much. She uses it for her artwork and eating her lunch. It was super easy to put together and is sturdy. Great for our almost two year old and will be used for at least a couple of years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for weaning
reviews.reviewText: My one year old loves this table and chair set. This is where she eats her snacks throughout the day. She sits in it all day. Easy to get in and out of. Light enough for her to push the table away when she needs to get up. Perfect for weaning into a chair of their very own.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact but comfortable for a toddler.
reviews.reviewText: I like that this desk is sturdy and stable for toddler use .Its also easy to clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Easy quick table
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I liked how easy it was to set this up. Better if you had your own little hex wrench because the tiny one they give you hurt my hand with the long screws. My little boy is 18 months and adapted well to it. He tries to climb in it and lean on the table and it can tip very easily. As long as they don't climb or lean on it it should work out fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble. Well made. Fits 2yr old perfectly with room to grow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the chalkboard feature
reviews.reviewText: Great little desk set for any toddler. This was really easy to assemble, the instructions are easy to follow. My daughter loves sitting here and playing. It also has a chalk board which is cool, I have had other desks like this that did not have that. Washable markers and paint come off very easily.
